projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Rock Paper Scissors
projects.bodyText: - Create a visually appealing and interactive user interface for a smooth and engaging Rock, Paper, Scissors game experience using React JS.

projects.title: Tasty Kitchens
projects.bodyText:
- Develop a user-friendly app interface for easy navigation and seamless order placement. 
 - Implement a real-time order tracking system to keep users informed about their food delivery status.
